changeSet.author: mdubrovin
changeSet.comment: Add "H14 not selected - Please verify" as an option for "Verify test order" hold reason
changeSet.sql: update `prodlims`.`nvstore` set json = "{\"notes\":[\"No test selected\", \"H14 not selected - Please verify\", \"Ambiguous and unclear panel orders\",\"Combo but no NPT samples provided (test requested)\",\"Combo but no CS samples provided (test requested)\"],\"log\":[]}" where name = 'HoldReason_VERIFY_ORDERS';
